about_the_game:
Flag 2 Book

This Flag-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The second flag book but this time with a twist!

Each image shows a part of the world map, and each country in that area is depicted in the colours of that nation's flag!

Contents

The Flag 2 book unlocks the following images:
  • Central Asia - 75x67
  • Great War Europe - 90x90
  • South East Asia - 93x70
  • Germania - 100x100
  • Northern Europe - 109x150
  • Caucasia - 120x125
  • Africa - 131x147
  • Australia - 140x130
  • East Asia - 143x86
  • Balkans - 145x110
  • North America - 146x130
  • Middle East - 146x133
  • Southern Asia - 146x135
  • Mediterranean - 150x75
  • South America - 174x295
  • The Isles - 185x290
  • Gulf of Mexico - 285x140
  • Iberia - 289x213
  • Europe - 295x260
  • Oceania Islands - 299x188

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Flag 2 Pack

  • Processor: Intel i5

  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
